title: Angular impulse - 4 time intervals in tau-t graph

content.question: A disk can rotate about an axis through its center and perpendicular to the plane of the disk. The graph shows the net torque exerted on the disk as a function of time. For which of the following time intervals was the angular impulse delivered to the disk the greatest in magnitude?

choices.label: <math alttext="0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>0</mn></math> to <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> second
<math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> to <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math> seconds
<math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math> to <math alttext="3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>3</mn></math> seconds
<math alttext="3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>3</mn></math> to <math alttext="4" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>4</mn></math> seconds

content.answer: <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> to <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math> seconds

unit.text: 6: Energy and Momentum of Rotating Systems

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
